item.title: **Solved **REQ DELETE
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

ok first of all declare this void: [code]public void Updates() {
sendFrame126("@dre@(SERVERNAME) Updates Menu", 8144); // Update Menu title
clearQuestInterface();
sendFrame126("", 8145);
sendFrame126("@dre@Welcome to @cya@Update Menu", 8146);
sendFrame126("@dre@MESSAGE HERE", 8147);
sendFrame126("@dre@MESSAGE HERE", 8148);
sendFrame126("@dre@MESSAGE HERE", 8149);
sendFrame126("@dre@MESSAGE HERE", 8150);
sendFrame126("@dre@ |", 8151);
sendFrame126("@dre@ |", 8152);
sendFrame126("@dre@ |", 8153);
sendFrame126("@dre@ |", 8154);
sendFrame126("@dre@ V", 8155);
sendFrame126("@dre@MESSAGE HERE", 8156);
sendFrame126("@dre@MESSAGE HERE", 8157);
sendFrame126("@dre@MESSAGE HERE", 8158);
sendFrame126("@dre@MESSAGE HERE", 8159);
sendFrame126("@dre@MESSAGE HERE", 8160);
sendFrame126("@dre@MESSAGE HERE", 8161);
sendFrame126("@dre@MESSAGE HERE", 8162);
sendFrame126("@dre@MESSAGE HERE", 8163);
sendFrame126("@dre@MESSAGE HERE", 8163);
sendFrame126("@dre@MESSAGE HERE", 8165);
sendFrame126("@dre@MESSAGE HERE", 8166);
sendFrame126("@dre@MESSAGE HERE", 8167);
sendFrame126("@dre@MESSAGE HERE", 8168);
sendFrame126("@dre@MESSAGE HERE", 8169);
sendFrame126("@dre@MESSAGE HERE", 8170);
sendFrame126("@dre@MESSAGE HERE", 8171);
sendFrame126("@dre@MESSAGE HERE", 8172);
sendFrame126("@dre@MESSAGE HERE", 8173);
sendFrame126("@dre@MESSAGE HERE", 8174);
sendFrame126("@dre@MESSAGE HERE", 8175);
sendFrame126("@dre@MESSAGE HERE", 8176);
sendFrame126("@dre@MESSAGE HERE", 8177);
sendFrame126("@dre@MESSAGE HERE", 8178);
sendFrame126("@dre@MESSAGE HERE", 8179);

	sendQuestSomething(8143);
	showInterface(8134); //End Of InterFace
}[/code]

Now you want to make a command that will bring up this interface ingame so add in this command:

if (playerRights >= 0) { if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("Updates")) { updates(); }
Simple as that
Note:- if u dont use up all those MESSAGE HERE lines, then erase the words message here so it’s left with “” and it wont appear on the interface

—James—

Read full topic
